mapper.select:
/* ContactUsMapper.selectContactUsInfo */ select cu.contact_id , cu.contact_type , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cu.contact_nm), SHA2(#{encryptKey}, 256)) AS CHAR) as contact_nm , cu.contact_title , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cu.contact_phone), SHA2(#{encryptKey}, 256)) AS CHAR) as contact_phone , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(cu.contact_mail), SHA2(#{encryptKey}, 256)) AS CHAR) as contact_mail , cu.contact_contents , cu.contact_recontents , cu.contact_pw , cu.contact_agree , DATE_FORMAT(cu.created_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as created_datetime , cu.contact_process , tf.file_nm , tf.file_origin_nm , tf.file_size from tb_contact_us cu left join tb_file tf on cu.contact_id = tf.file_id where 1 = 1
and cu.contact_id = #{id}
